## How to introduce yourself online?

Lots of ways!

4 for us:

--

1. Name tag: GitHub profile `r emo::ji("name_badge")` (`day 01`)

1. Business card: a postcard (about page) `r emo::ji("love_letter")` (`day 01`)

1. Cup of coffee: a distill website (about page + projects + blog) `r emo::ji("coffee")` (`day 01`)

1. Happy hour: a blogdown site `r emo::ji("dango")` (`day 02`)
